briefTitle: Clinical Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Desoximetasone (DSXS) With Atopic Dermatitis
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel-Design, Multiple-Site Clinical Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of DSXS in Patients With Moderate to Severe Atopic Dermatitis.
summary: Efficacy and Safety of DSXS (Taro Pharmaceuticals, U.S.A., Inc.) in Patients with Moderate to Severe Atopic Dermatitis

primaryOutcome.measure: The Number of Patients in Each Treatment Group That Have Clinical Success
